website_summaries.verdict: While it has superior moisturizing capabilities and excellent SPF; other brands offer similar features, more shades, and lower prices.
pros: Has a creamy consistency in a rich formula that's suitable for dry skin
Blends easily and feels moisturizing on the face
cons: Looks somewhat oily, especially on oily skin
Doesn't come in very many shades

customer_reviews.title: Sent it back spent $70 on it it looked wonderful on YouTube and it supposed to be good for ...
customer_reviews.text: Sent it back spent $70 on it it looked wonderful on YouTube and it supposed to be good for older skin but it hurt my skin it burned it and didn’t seem to cover any flaws like it said I was disappointed.

customer_reviews.title: I wasn't prepared to like or dislike this but I was hopeful
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't prepared to like or dislike this but I was hopeful. I am torn about this review because when I first used it I hated it but now I've found a way to love it for a couple of reasons, I hate sunscreens on my face, they always feel heavy and they smell. I found this product worked better for me over a primer, I use a matte because this stuff has gold flecks in it and too much shine can makes me just look wet.
customer_reviews.author: Rain

customer_reviews.title: NOT WORTH THE PRICE

customer_reviews.title: Best quality foundation on the market!

Plus, it's a moisturizer with sunscreen. Great product that I have reordered several times!

customer_reviews.title: Really Happy With This Product
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. I used it for the first time this AM. It went on very smoothly and blended in well. There were no streaks or blobs of make-up visible. It's not a foundation so don't expect perfect coverage. It's just a bit of color. I purchased the Light-Medium and found the color was just right. I'm usually disappointed by make-up but this is the real thing. A bit pricey but I've paid more for other products and been less satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: Several shades available

customer_reviews.title: I really like this tinted moisturizing balm
customer_reviews.text: I really like this tinted moisturizing balm. It goes on smoothly, covers and gives a nice glow. I am very happy with it.

It is expensive, but so worth it & now I can throw away 4 other makeup bottles that all total a lot more than this jar.

customer_reviews.title: I wasn't happy with this after paying the price
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't happy with this after paying the price... it was greasy and had a terrible odor to it. I was afraid to have people hug me because our cheeks would actually 'stick' for a second. Wont buy again.

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for!

And I can already tell this container will last me a long time. Like it so much, I'm going to see if there's a shade darker for summer.
customer_reviews.author: Gayle A. Schneider

customer_reviews.title: Expensive
customer_reviews.text: Way too expensive. I saw this used in an awesome YouTube video and I bought it for my mother. Willing to spend more on her than myself. She let me try it out because I thought about getting it for myself. It's not bad. It gives a very dewy look, almost greasy. I do like it but it's far too expensive for how much I do or do not like it. Wouldn't spend this much. The price goes up and down on here from $75 down to $55... and I wouldn't spend that much for either price.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Godino
